TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit AddInToken extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<valuetype System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class AddInToken Implements IEnumerable(Of QualificationDataItem)
type AddInToken = class interface seq<QualificationDataItem> interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示可啟動的增益集。

span.span: Represents an add-in that can be activated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件代表增益集，以及其相關聯的管線區段，可啟動。An object represents an add-in, and its associated pipeline segments, that can be activated. 權杖會包含名稱、 組件名稱、 描述、 發行者及版本的增益集，它表示。The token contains the name, assembly name, description, publisher, and version of the add-in that it represents. 使用方法來取得權杖，代表增益集的管線符合指定的主機 檢視的集合。Use the method to get a collection of tokens that represent add-ins whose pipelines match a specified host view. 使用方法來取得權杖，代表所有管線針對指定的增益集，符合指定的主機檢視的集合。Use the method to get a collection of tokens that represent all the pipelines for a specified add-in that match a specified host view. 若要啟動的增益集，將想要增益集來代表語彙基元傳遞方法。To activate an add-in, pass the token that represents the desired add-in to the method. 這個方法會傳回代表增益集的 [主機] 檢視的類型的執行個體。This method returns an instance of the type that represents the host view of the add-in. 方法有數個多載。The method has several overloads. 當您使用不需要應用程式定義域的名稱做為其中一個參數的多載時，會自動建立新的應用程式定義域，增益集。When you use an overload that does not require the name of an application domain as one of its parameters, a new application domain for the add-in is automatically created. 您可以使用 Language-Integrated Query (LINQ) 的擴充方法來在執行查詢，此語彙基元視為集合結構。You can use Language-Integrated Query (LINQ) extension methods to perform queries on an , treating the token as a collection of structures. ## Examples 本節包含兩個範例。This section contains two examples. 第一個範例會啟動已選取使用增益集`ChooseAddIn`方法，而第二個範例會示範`ChooseAddIn`方法。The first example activates an add-in that has been selected by using the `ChooseAddIn` method, and the second example shows the `ChooseAddIn` method. **範例 1****Example 1** 下列範例示範如何啟動增益集與語彙基元。The following example shows how to activate an add-in with a token. [!code-csharp[AddInP3Host#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/cs/P3Host.cs#5)] [!code-vb[AddInP3Host#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/vb/p3host.vb#5)] **範例 2****Example 2** 下列範例顯示的自訂`ChooseAddIn`方法，列舉集合。The following example shows the custom `ChooseAddIn` method, which enumerates an collection. 使用者從這個集合的相對應的增益集啟動選取的語彙基元。The user selects a token from this collection to activate the corresponding add-in. [!code-csharp[AddInP3Host#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/cs/P3Host.cs#13)] [!code-vb[AddInP3Host#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/vb/p3host.vb#13)]

summary.span: 啟動增益集。

span.span: Activates an add-in in the environment of another add-in.
The host view of the add-in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法多載增益集相同的應用程式定義域和處理程序會啟動增益集從中`environment`取得。This method overload activates the add-in in the same application domain and process as the add-in from which `environment` was obtained. ## Examples 下列範例會啟動一個增益集內指定的安全性層級的自動產生的應用程式定義域中。The following example activates one add-in in an automatically generated application domain with a specified security level. 然後會啟動第二個增益集相同的應用程式定義域和處理程序做為第一次使用第一個增益集的物件。It then activates a second add-in in the same application domain and process as the first by using the first add-in's object. [!code-csharp[AddInP3Host#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/cs/P3Host.cs#8)] [!code-vb[AddInP3Host#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/vb/p3host.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法多載增益集載入自動產生的應用程式定義域。This method overload loads the add-in into an automatically generated application domain. 如果您想要指定新的應用程式定義域的名稱，使用多載。If you want to specify a name for the new application domain, use the overload. 這個方法會設定應用程式定義域的增益集組件位置的基底目錄。This method sets the base directory for the application domain to be the location of the add-in assembly. 它也會尋找的組態檔 [addinassemblyname].dll.config 與的如果找到，它是新的應用程式定義域的組態檔設定。It also looks for the configuration file [addinassemblyname].dll.config and, if found, sets it to be the configuration file for the new application domain. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何啟動增益集，所選的語彙基元，以指定的安全性層級的自動產生的應用程式定義域中所識別。The following example shows how to activate an add-in, identified by the chosen token, in an automatically generated application domain with a specified security level. [!code-csharp[AddInP3Host#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/cs/P3Host.cs#5)] [!code-vb[AddInP3Host#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/vb/p3host.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要啟用自動產生的應用程式定義域中增益集，請使用多載，以產生新的應用程式定義域指定的安全性層級或多載，以包含應用程式定義域的易記名稱。To activate an add-in in an automatically generated application domain, use the overload to generate a new application domain with a specified security level or the overload to include a friendly name for the application domain. ## Examples 下列範例會啟動增益集，正由另一個增益集的應用程式定義域中。The following example activates an add-in in an application domain that is being used by another add-in. 第一個增益集的程式碼中提供類別。The code for the first add-in is provided in the class. [!code-csharp[AddInP3Host#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/cs/P3Host.cs#9)] [!code-vb[AddInP3Host#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/vb/p3host.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法多載增益集載入自動產生的應用程式定義域。This method overload loads the add-in into an automatically generated application domain. 它會設定應用程式定義域的增益集組件位置的基底目錄。It sets the base directory for the application domain to be the location of the add-in assembly. 它也會尋找組態檔`[addinassemblyname].dll.config`而且，如果找到，則設定為新的應用程式定義域的組態檔。It also looks for the configuration file `[addinassemblyname].dll.config` and, if found, sets it to be the configuration file for the new application domain.

summary.span: 取得及設定值，這個值表示在條件允許下增益集是否應直接連接至其主應用程式。

span.span: Gets and sets a value that indicates whether add-ins should be directly connected to their hosts when conditions permit.

value.span: 如果增益集應直接連接至主應用程式，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the add-in should be directly connected to the host; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 發生的直接連線，必須存在下列條件：The following conditions must exist for the direct connection to occur: - 此屬性必須設為`true`。This property must be set to `true`. - 增益集必須位於相同的應用程式定義域，為主機。The add-in must be in the same application domain as the host. - 增益集 檢視和增益集主應用程式檢視必須是相同的類型。The add-in view and the host view of the add-in must be the same type. - 管線的所有區段都必須可用。All the segments of the pipeline must be available. 建立直接連線時，增益集端配接器和主應用程式端配接器是未具現化。When a direct connection is established, the add-in-side adapter and the host-side adapter are not instantiated.

summary.span: 傳回與這個語彙基元相關之管線區段的限定性條件資料列舉程式。

span.span: Returns an enumerator for the qualification data of the pipeline segments that are associated with this token.

returns.span: 列舉程式，可用來逐一查看與目前語彙基元相關之管線區段的限定性條件資料。

span.span: An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the qualification data of the pipeline segments that are associated with the current token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來處理，就好像的限定性條件資料項目，例如，集合中的語彙基元`foreach`陳述式 (`For Each` Visual Basic 中`for each`Visual c + +)。Use this method to treat a token as if it were a collection of qualification data items, for example, in a `foreach` statement (`For Each` in Visual Basic, `for each` in Visual C++). 這個方法所傳回的列舉值可用來逐一查看目前的語彙基元相關聯之管線區段的限定性條件資料項目。Use the enumerator returned by this method to iterate through the qualification data items of the pipeline segments associated with the current token. 限定性條件資料的每個項目是結構，以識別管線區段，並包含名稱/值組從屬性套用至該區段。Each item of qualification data is a structure that identifies the pipeline segment and contains a name/value pair from a attribute applied to that segment. > [!NOTE] > 增益集模型中不會將套用至增益集的 [主機] 檢視的限定性條件資料。The add-in model does not use qualification data that is applied to the host view of the add-in. 如此一來，當您列舉限定性條件資料，您將無法找到任何項目其屬性是。As a result, when you enumerate qualification data you will not find any items whose property is . 或者，您可以使用屬性來取得一組巢狀包含限定性條件資料之管線區段的字典。Alternatively, you can use the property to get a nested set of dictionaries that contain the qualification data of the pipeline segments. ## Examples 下列範例會列出每個相關聯之管線區段的限定性條件資料語彙基元的集合中。The following example lists the qualification data for the pipeline segments associated with each in a collection of tokens. [!code-csharp[AddInP3Host#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/cs/P3Host.cs#12)] [!code-vb[AddInP3Host#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/vb/p3host.vb#12)]

summary.span: 取得與目前語彙基元關聯之管線中區段相關資料的字典。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of data about the segments in the pipeline associated with the current token.

value.span: 字典，其索引鍵為管線區段，其值為表示每個區段限定性條件資料之名稱/值組的字典。

span.span: A dictionary whose keys are pipeline segments and whose values are dictionaries of name/value pairs that represent qualification data for each segment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來取得已套用至管線與區段的資料屬性。Use this property to obtain data that has been applied to pipeline segments with the attribute. 您可以使用這項資料來識別及處理的類型，撰寫您的管線。You can use this data to identify and work with the types that compose your pipelines. 這個屬性會傳回字典的字典。This property returns a dictionary of dictionaries. 最上層字典一律會有六個索引鍵。The top dictionary always has six keys. 每個索引鍵是管線中區段的值。Each key is an value for a segment in the pipeline. 每個值為泛型之字串的字串索引鍵，其中包含區段的限定性條件資料。Each value is a generic of strings with string keys that contains the segment's qualification data. 索引鍵及這些內部的字典值名稱就是和中的值指定區段的屬性。The keys and values of these inner dictionaries are the names and values specified in the attributes for the segments. 如果沒有限定性條件資料已套用至區段，其字典是空的。If no qualification data has been applied to a segment, its dictionary is empty. > [!NOTE] > 增益集模型中不會將套用至增益集的 [主機] 檢視的限定性條件資料。The add-in model does not use qualification data that is applied to the host view of the add-in. 如此一來，字典永遠是空的。As a result, the dictionary for is always empty. 或者，您可以取得限定性條件資料列舉如同一般的集合結構，使用`foreach`陳述式 (`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中`for each`Visual c + +)。Alternatively, you can obtain qualification data by enumerating an as if it were a collection of structures, using a `foreach` statement (`For Each` in Visual Basic, `for each` in Visual C++). 提供的範例，請參閱結構。See the example provided for the structure. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何檢查增益集的限定性條件資料。The following example shows how to examine an add-in's qualification data. [!code-csharp[AddInP3Host#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/cs/P3Host.cs#11)] [!code-vb[AddInP3Host#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/vb/p3host.vb#11)]

returns.span: 列舉程式，可用來逐一查看與目前語彙基元相關之管線區段的限定性條件資料。

span.span: An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the qualification data of the pipeline segments that are associated with the current token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓被視為集合的限定性條件資料項目，例如在語彙基元`foreach`陳述式 (`For Each` Visual Basic 中`for each`Visual c + +)。This method allows a token to be treated like a collection of qualification data items, for example in a `foreach` statement (`For Each` in Visual Basic, `for each` in Visual C++). 這個方法所傳回的列舉值可用來逐一查看目前的語彙基元相關聯之管線區段的限定性條件資料項目。Use the enumerator returned by this method to iterate through the qualification data items of the pipeline segments associated with the current token. 限定性條件資料的每個項目是結構，以識別管線區段，並包含名稱/值組，從屬性套用至該區段。Each item of qualification data is a structure that identifies the pipeline segment and contains the name/value pair from a attribute applied to that segment. > [!NOTE] > 增益集模型中不會將套用至增益集的 [主機] 檢視的限定性條件資料。The add-in model does not use qualification data that is applied to the host view of the add-in. 如此一來，當您列舉限定性條件資料，您將無法找到任何項目其屬性是。As a result, when you enumerate qualification data you will not find any items whose property is . 或者，您可以使用屬性來取得一組巢狀包含限定性條件資料之管線區段的字典。Alternatively, you can use the property to get a nested set of dictionaries containing the qualification data of the pipeline segments.
